oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Daniel Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A portrait of General Daniel Morgan, seated on a box in buckskin clothing, holding a rifle, a powder horn slung across his shoulder, and a hat at his feet.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chappel, Alonzo, 1828-1887
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Morgan, Daniel, 1736-1802
